title: Rocket girl tristana chroma effects [GAMEPLAY]
body: The rocket girl chroma pack, I noticed when i used it today had the same effects as the classic skin. Not the effects it should have. Such as the orange flames for her q instead of the blue rings. I was using the pink haired chroma when i found it.

replies.body:
Thanks for the report! 

Look like you're right - only the base Rocket Girl Tristana is using the proper particles, and the chromas have defaulted to base. Looking a bit more into this now!
I'm pretty sure Chromas are just a recolor of the skin with no different animations
No the effects of the skin were the same as tristana without a skin
